Paragraph: Both copolymers also exhibited high J SC s and FFs , indicating their decent ability for charge generation and transport.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |

Note: In this paragraph, "copolymers" is the only clear material name reference. The terms "J SC" and "FFs" are not material names, but rather abbreviations for performance metrics in solar cells, namely "short-circuit current density" and "fill factor," respectively.
